CustomField.description: ID for the product line record. This ID is 1 for all base product records/tier records. This ID is the identifier of the type of add on (ex: Priority Support and HR Services). Matched to the Product Line ID of the Product record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ID for the product line record. This ID is 1 for all base product records/tier records. This ID is the identifier of the type of add on (ex: Priority Support and HR Services). Matched to the Product Line ID of the Product record.
CustomField.label: Product Line ID
